Package fr.umlv.tatoo.cc.common.log

Interface Summary
DiagnosticReporter  
DiagnosticReporter.Key  
 

Class Summary
AbstractDiagnosticReporter<W extends Enum<W> & DiagnosticReporter.Key>  
Info Info is an inmutable/mutable class that gathers different informations in order to report them using a Reporter.
LoggerReporter A reporter that use Logger to report informations.
Reporter A reporter is able to report a specific Info by providing an implementation of the method Reporter.report(Info).
ReporterFactory This class permits to install/uninstall a reporter on the current thread.
UserDefinedLevelMap<K extends Enum<K> & DiagnosticReporter.Key>  
 

Enum Summary
DiagnosticReporter.Level  
Level Levels used by the reporter and the information.
